articles.title: Israel launches airstrikes targeting Yemen’s Houthi rebels, and Houthis launch missile at Israel
articles.description: Israel's military conducted airstrikes on Houthi-controlled ports and facilities in Yemen, prompting retaliatory missile fire from the Houthis targeting Israel. This escalation follows an attack on a Liberian-flagged ship in the Red Sea, suspected to be carried out by the Houthis.

articles.title: UNAids chief ‘shaken and disgusted’ by US cuts that will mean millions more deaths
articles.description: Winnie Byanyima, executive director of UNAids, expressed deep concern over significant U.S. aid cuts, warning that if funding permanently disappears, the world could face an additional 6 million HIV infections and 4 million AIDS-related deaths by 2029.

articles.title: Weedkiller ingredient widely used in US can damage organs and gut bacteria, research shows
articles.description: New research indicates that diquat, a herbicide replacing glyphosate in some U.S. weedkillers, can harm gut bacteria and damage organs. Despite being banned in several countries due to its toxicity, the EPA has resisted calls for a ban in the U.S.
